sense.gloss: Common Era, CE, Christian Era, anno domini, AD
kanreki, one's 60th birthday (or 61st in the traditional age reckoning system) when one has lived through a full sexagenary cycle
the solar calendar, the Gregorian calendar
calendar year, civil year, time, year after year
calendar reform, adoption of a new calendar system
new calendar (for a new year), new year

sdata.j: ↑中国↑↓ちゅうごく↓では、↑旧暦↑↓きゅうれき↓にしたがって↑正月↑↓しょうがつ↓を↑祝↑↓いわ↓う。
sdata.e: In China, they celebrate New Year by the lunar calendar.

sdata.j: ↑昭和↑↓しょうわ↓１０↑年↑↓ねん↓は↑西暦↑↓せいれき↓１９３５↑年↑↓ねん↓です。
sdata.e: The 10th year of Showa is 1935 in the Western calendar.

sdata.j: ↑中国↑↓ちゅうごく↓では、↑旧暦↑↓きゅうれき↓にしたがって↑正月↑↓しょうがつ↓を↑祝↑↓いわ↓う。
sdata.e: In China, they celebrate the New Year by the lunar calendar.

sdata.j: ↑母方↑↓ははかた↓の↑祖父↑↓そふ↓は↑明日↑↓あした↓↑還暦↑↓かんれき↓を↑迎↑↓むか↓える。
sdata.e: My grandfather on my mother's side is celebrating his 60th birthday tomorrow.

sdata.j: ↑明日↑↓あした↓は↑母方↑↓ははかた↓の↑祖父↑↓そふ↓の↑還暦↑↓かんれき↓↑祝↑↓いわ↓いをする。
sdata.e: My grandfather on my mother's side is celebrating his 60th birthday tomorrow.

sdata.j: ↑明日↑↓あした↓は↑母方↑↓ははかた↓の↑祖父↑↓そふ↓の↑還暦↑↓かんれき↓のお↑祝↑↓いわ↓いをする。
sdata.e: My grandfather on my mother's side is celebrating his 60th birthday tomorrow.

sdata.j: ↑古代↑↓こだい↓エジプトでは、1↑年↑↓ねん↓を365↑日↑↓にち↓とする↑太陽暦↑↓たいようれき↓が↑用↑↓もち↓いられた。
sdata.e: Ancient Egypt used a solar calendar with 365 days in a year.

words.gloss: Common Era, CE, Christian Era, anno domini, AD
